</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 155</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _spider gun_ is a _+1 striking weapon_. It's a distinct type of martial firearm made from the fangs and spinneret of a Large spider. It deals 1d10 poison damage with a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 30 feet and [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254). On a critical hit, the venom clings to the target and they take [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to 1d4 + the number of weapon damage dice. A spider gun does not add critical specialization effects. The gun can be activated to fire webbing that hampers other creatures.

<document level="2" id="action-959" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials for the _spider gun_ must include the fangs and spinneret of a giant spider or other Large spider.
